text: just before rain you'll notice that the
visibility changes quite dramatically so
all you have to do is pick a series of
landmarks and the direction that the
rain comes from my name is Tristan gully
I'm the author of how to read water
clues and patterns from puddles to the
sea wherever you are in the world rain
will tend to come in from the same
direction most of the year now if you
look in that direction just before rain
you'll notice that the visibility
changes quite dramatically so all you
have to do is pick a series of landmarks
in the direction that the rain comes
from from the southwest of the UK and
most of northwest Europe you pick these
landmarks and then you just tick them
off as the rain comes in so you can with
only a small amount of practice say
quite confidently the rain will start in
15 minutes and it does I was taught how
to predict the exact moment rain will
come when I was out in Thailand we were
enjoying a holiday spending a bit of
time at cafes on the beach and the staff
there used to clear everything away and
say to us rain is coming in 10 minutes
and I asked them about this is the sort
of thing that makes me curious and they
just pointed to the limestone islands
and pillars out in a sea and they were
able to predict exactly when the rain
would come by watching these islands
steadily disappear rain in half an hour
rain in 15 minutes
rain in 10 minutes here it comes
you
